function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Need for interdisciplinary collaboration in handling the crisis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of research on factors influencing ppe production, distribution, and usage","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deficiency in pandemic spark assessment and prior containment strategies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Feasibility and cost issues in implementing strategic protocols","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Search databases may not cover all relevant articles related to contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or inaccurate search queries may result in irrelevant or biased results","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited coverage of historical literature may result in incomplete understanding of pandemic trends and strategies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The spread of covid-19 in cities and countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
